Summary: Cigar shaped drone over Independence, MO
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around November 23rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling North on Noland Road in Independence when I saw a flying object near Noland Road and 23rd Street flying in a Southwest direction. It was a silvery white shiny color with a dark color nose and flying at a 45 degree angle down, but with the nose even with the craft, not nose-down. No wings or tail. It was an oval or cigar shape. There was no sound. The size was small but I could not tell the size - I am sure however that this was much smaller than a single engine small aircraft, more the size of a large model plane. There are no model airfields near this location. I would be surprised if no one else saw this.
